paragraphs: Ace of Pubs, a start-up that conducts 150+ quizzes per month in restaurants across India.
bulletPoints: Measured the revenue impact of Ace of Pubs on restaurants.
Compiled the findings into a pitch deck for Ace of Pubs, aiding them in onboarding more restaurants.
